narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Bht&d Gusco Money Management LLC is a Supports Brokerage provider based in Saranac, MI. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $14.0M in Medicaid payments across 176K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $14.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
